source.dacc38af:
from tqdm import tqdm
num = []
for i in range(0,24):
    num.append(i)
i=0
j=1
count = []

for i in tqdm(range(len(num)-1)):
    #print("i "+str(num[i]))
    
    #print("j "+str(num[j]))
    
    if i < 9:
       
        #print('0'+str(i)+":"+'00'+':'+"00")
        hour_start = '0'+str(i)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
        #print('0'+str(j)+":"+'00'+':'+"00")
        hour_end = '0'+str(j)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
        #print(" ")
        #print(hour_start)
        #print(hour_end)
        #print(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
        count.append(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
    
    elif i==9:
            hour_start = '0'+str(i)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
            hour_end = str(j)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
            #print(hour_start)
            #print(hour_end)
            #print(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
            count.append(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
            
            
    else:
            #print(str(i)+":"+'00'+':'+"00")
            hour_start = str(i)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
            #print(str(j)+":"+'00'+':'+"00")
            hour_end = str(j)+":"+'00'+':'+"00"
            #print(" ")
            #print(hour_start)
            #print(hour_end)
            #print(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
            count.append(len(df[(df['Time']>=hour_start)&(df['Time']<=hour_end)]))
        
    i = j;
    j = i+1;
    #print("")
